author: wn.com
title: Concerns bikes on footpaths will put blind and vision impaired people in danger, Royal Society ...
text: South Australian road rule changes which allow cyclists of all ages to ride on footpaths will put people who are blind or vision impaired in danger, the Royal Society for the Blind says. ...
